name: THE SKIES: REBORN
description:
The Skies Reborn is a post-apocalyptic MMORPG in which you follow your own path or join other players to conquer the wasteland.
In this innovative sandbox you create your own adventure in a player driven economy. Your actions will result in the development of both the world and your character.
The story of the game is set at the beginning of the 21st century, when solar activity has increased dramatically. Within two weeks, civilization collapsed, destroying energy sources, government and infrastructure. The temperature at the surface of the earth became unbearably high. People were forced to go down the drain.
In the 2070s. the temperature began to drop slightly and the survivors began to surface and rebuild civilization. In order to survive, people began to unite into clans. And only strength now determines who will live and prosper in the wasteland, and who is destined to leave the new cruel world forever.

Are you strong enough to find your place under the scorching sun?

Game features
• Huge game world - 12km2, filled with interesting places to explore and farm.

• Unique character leveling system - we will give you the freedom to develop your character in accordance with your style of play.

• Effective decision making - watch the world change with your story, become more than a survivor, thrive with a group and dominate the wasteland.

• Exciting PVP action - hunt down other players like a lone wolf, or join a clan and conquer and rule entire wasteland cities.

• Deep crafting system - develop your character to face the harsh world by crafting modern equipment, trade, craft and prosper.
